message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the value this product offers is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,275,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1,275,000. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $1,225,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
